column5: does anyone know for sure if parts of hwy 502 are closed because of high water or washouts? will be going up for the opener and will be on that stretch from 2:30 am to 4:30 am. thanks for any answers.
[font color=green size=3][b]Hwy 502 was reopened at about 9PM. Wednesday according to Fort Francis OPP. A culvert had washed out about 40K south of Dryden.
Any more wash out problems with 502? Any problems at all?
502 is in it's usual wonderful condition.just came back on tues. may 14. only construction is at the very end near dryden.
Last time I was on 502 it was rough as a cob but that was several years ago seriuosly is it in good shape?
the first stretch(about 40 miles) is real rough(fort francis end) while the rest is pretty good.we went about 60 -65 mph on the straight stretches but some pretty good bumps.
